A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi is another great Star Wars movie. Don't listen to the fan boys\, this movie goes to places no Star Wars movie has gone\, great acting\, cinematography\, directing\, editing\, etc. I only have one problem\, it's an small scene with a lead character that does something that's seems not very \"Star Wars\"\, but all the rest works.
